Hi Cipher! Welcome to the group. I hope you enjoy your time here. 

>Few years ago I started a hobby by collecting swords,I haven't got 
>many swords mostly Chinese and Japanese swords.My most favorite was 
>the japanese katana and ever since I'm interested in Japanese 
>Samuar$B}(Bhistory,so here I am,this is all very new to me,but I want 
>to learn everything there is to know.

Leaning it all is a big task. :) I suggest starting slow. Ask a few 
specific questions about whatever it is you're most interested in. I'm 
sure you'll get a lot of information from the good folks here.
